LMIA_NOT_OBTAINED.description: Required LMIA not provided or negative assessment
LMIA_NOT_OBTAINED.implications: Application will be refused under R200
LMIA_NOT_OBTAINED.remediation: Obtain valid LMIA or demonstrate exemption eligibility

CREDENTIALS_MISMATCH.implications: Officer may refuse as applicant lacks capability
CREDENTIALS_MISMATCH.remediation: Credential verification, reference letters, evidence of competency
CREDENTIALS_MISMATCH.court_authority: Discretionary assessment of capability to perform duties

EMPLOYER_FRAUD_RISK.description: Employer legitimacy or fraud risk concerns
EMPLOYER_FRAUD_RISK.remediation: Employer verification, third-party confirmation, LMIA documentation
EMPLOYER_FRAUD_RISK.court_authority: Officer must assess genuineness of employment offer

IMMIGRANT_INTENT_SIGNAL.description: Evidence indicates intent to settle permanently in Canada
IMMIGRANT_INTENT_SIGNAL.implications: Application refused due to permanent settlement intent
IMMIGRANT_INTENT_SIGNAL.remediation: Establish ties to home country, explicit return plan, family abroad
IMMIGRANT_INTENT_SIGNAL.court_authority: Applicant must demonstrate temporary intent under R200

WAGE_COMPLIANCE_ISSUE.description: Offered wages below prevailing standards or minimum
WAGE_COMPLIANCE_ISSUE.implications: Officer may refuse as conditions exploitative or non-compliant
WAGE_COMPLIANCE_ISSUE.remediation: Wage documentation, prevailing rate verification, contract amendment
WAGE_COMPLIANCE_ISSUE.court_authority: Service Canada LMIA wage assessment; human trafficking concerns

ADMISSIBILITY_CONCERN.description: Grounds for inadmissibility under IRPA identified
ADMISSIBILITY_CONCERN.implications: Application will be refused automatically if inadmissible
ADMISSIBILITY_CONCERN.remediation: Legal clearance, medical examination, police certificate, waiver if applicable

TIES_ASSESSMENT_WEAK.description: Applicant has minimal ties to home country
TIES_ASSESSMENT_WEAK.implications: Officer may infer intent to remain in Canada
TIES_ASSESSMENT_WEAK.remediation: Family documentation, property proof, employment history, return plan

WORKPLACE_EXPLOITATION_RISK.description: Indicators of workplace abuse or trafficking
WORKPLACE_EXPLOITATION_RISK.implications: Application refused; human trafficking investigation possible
WORKPLACE_EXPLOITATION_RISK.remediation: Worker protection documentation, contract review, safe workplace confirmation

DOCUMENTATION_FRAUD_RISK.description: Forged, falsified, or fraudulent documents detected
DOCUMENTATION_FRAUD_RISK.implications: Application refused; fraud investigation; potential deportation
DOCUMENTATION_FRAUD_RISK.remediation: None - application cannot proceed if fraud confirmed

_audit_guidance.scoring_system: Each badge represents discrete risk factor. Multiple badges increase refusal probability.
_audit_guidance.assessment_process: Identify badges present in case, assess severity, recommend mitigation strategy
_audit_guidance.validation_source: Federal Court jurisprudence on work permit applications (2018-2025)
_audit_guidance.update_frequency: Quarterly - aligned with court decisions and policy changes
